items.answer: We accommodate orders from small batches to large-scale production, with flexible minimum order quantities starting from 50 units.
items.question: What are your minimum order requirements?

items.answer: Standard lead times range from 2-4 weeks depending on product complexity and order volume. Custom projects may require additional time.
items.question: How long does production typically take?

items.answer: We maintain strict ISO-compliant quality control processes, ensuring every component meets rigorous industry standards and customer specifications.
items.question: What quality assurance do you provide?

items.answer: Our laser writing and custom manufacturing capabilities allow complete personalization of door parts to match your exact requirements.
items.question: Can you customize door components?

aboutusintro.title: About RK Enterprise
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Specialists
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 2016, RK Enterprise has established itself as a leading manufacturer of precision door parts and window components. We combine advanced manufacturing technologies with deep industry expertise to deliver exceptional, customized solutions for our clients across various sectors.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: RK Enterprise consistently delivers high-quality door components that meet our exact specifications. Their attention to detail and customer service is exceptional.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: We've been working with RK Enterprise for years. Their custom manufacturing capabilities and quick turnaround times are truly impressive.
